type.name: MeterERP_Pass
type.text:
ALTER procedure [dbo].[MeterERP_Pass]
--设备名 @MeterName nvarchar(20)=null, --批次号 @MeterCode nvarchar(20)=null , --自检批次总数 @MeterCheckCount float=null, --不合格数 @MeterUnPassCount float=null, --一次通过率 @MeterPassRate nvarchar(20)=null, --时间 @MeterCheckDate datetime=null
as
if not exists(select * from dbo.sysobjects where name='MeterERP_PassRate') create table MeterERP_PassRate( MeterName varchar(255) null, MeterCode varchar(255) null, MeterCheckCount int null, MeterUnPassCount int null, MeterPassRate nvarchar(20) null, MeterCheckDate datetime null );
declare @num int --游标循环用 declare @codenum int declare @Timenum int declare @EveryType nvarchar(20) --用来依次选取设备类型名 declare @EveryCode nvarchar(20) --用来依次获取批次号 declare @EveryTime datetime --用来依次获取时间 declare @Hang int --设备名输出参数 declare @CodeHang int --批次号输出参数 declare @DateHang int --时间输出参数 declare @AllNum float --计算过检总数输出参数 declare @PassNum float --计算通过率通过数量
declare @ComType nvarchar(20), @ComCode nvarchar(20), @ComCheckCount int, @ComUnPassCount int
set @num=0 set @codenum=1 set @Timenum=1 begin try begin tran --获取设备名称循环 declare TypeTab CURSOR for --声明游标 获取设备名 select distinct MeterType from [CSTDATA].[dbo].[MeterERP_CheckInformation] where MeterType<>''or MeterType<>null and (CheckDate>dateadd(year, datediff(year, 0, getdate())-1, 0) and CheckDate<=CONVERT(varchar(30),getdate(),21)); select @Hang=count(distinct MeterType) from [CSTDATA].[dbo].[MeterERP_CheckInformation] where MeterType<>''or MeterType<>null and (CheckDate>dateadd(year, datediff(year, 0, getdate())-1, 0) and CheckDate<=CONVERT(varchar(30),getdate(),21)); open TypeTab fetch next from TypeTab into @EveryType while (@num<=@Hang) begin --获取批次号循环 declare CodeTab CURSOR for select distinct left(right(MeterCode,8),4) MeterCode from [CSTDATA].[dbo].[MeterERP_CheckInformation] where MeterType=@EveryType and (CheckDate>dateadd(year, datediff(year, 0, getdate())-1, 0) and CheckDate<=CONVERT(varchar(30),getdate(),21)); select @CodeHang=count(distinct left(right(MeterCode,8),4)) from [CSTDATA].[dbo].[MeterERP_CheckInformation] where MeterType=@EveryType and (CheckDate>dateadd(year, datediff(year, 0, getdate())-1, 0) and CheckDate<=CONVERT(varchar(30),getdate(),21)); open CodeTab fetch next from CodeTab into @EveryCode while(@codenum<=@CodeHang) begin select @AllNum=count(*) from [CSTDATA].[dbo].[MeterERP_CheckInformation] where MeterType=@EveryType and left(right(MeterCode,8),4)=@EveryCode select @PassNum=count(*) from [CSTDATA].[dbo].[MeterERP_CheckInformation] where MeterType=@EveryType and left(right(MeterCode,8),4)=@EveryCode and CheckResult='True' set @MeterName=@EveryType set @MeterCode=@EveryCode set @MeterCheckCount=@AllNum set @MeterUnPassCount=@AllNum-@PassNum set @MeterPassRate=convert(varchar, convert(numeric(18,2),@PassNum/@AllNum)*100)+'%' if exists(select * from MeterERP_PassRate where MeterName=@MeterName and MeterCode=@MeterCode) begin select @ComCheckCount=MeterCheckCount,@ComUnPassCount=MeterUnPassCount from MeterERP_PassRate where @ComType=MeterName and @ComCode=MeterCode if(@ComCheckCount=@MeterCheckCount and @ComUnPassCount=@MeterUnPassCount) begin break end else begin update MeterERP_PassRate set MeterCheckCount=@MeterCheckCount,MeterUnPassCount=@MeterUnPassCount where MeterName=@MeterName and MeterCode=@MeterCode end end else begin insert into MeterERP_PassRate(MeterName,MeterCode,MeterCheckCount,MeterUnPassCount,MeterPassRate) values(@MeterName,@MeterCode,@MeterCheckCount,@MeterUnPassCount,@MeterPassRate) end
fetch next from CodeTab into @EveryCode set @codenum=@codenum+1 end close CodeTab deallocate CodeTab set @codenum=1
fetch next from TypeTab into @EveryType set @num=@num+1
end close TypeTab deallocate TypeTab
COMMIT TRAN end try begin catch ROLLBACK end catch
机电一体化产品一次通过率存储过程88888888888888888999999
